short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful Chrome extension designed to block distracting sites and boost productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Site Blocker: Focus Enhancer for Students and Organizations

Boost productivity and minimize distractions with the only site blocker on the Chrome Web Store that supports JSON config deployment via Google Admin Console.

Key Features:
- Block distracting sites with customizable keyword filters
- Seamless enterprise deployment for IT administrators
- Redirect to a motivational "blocked" page
- User-friendly interface for personal customization

Perfect for:
- Schools and educational institutions
- Students aiming to improve focus
- Parents managing online activities
- Organizations fostering a productive work environment

Unique Admin Capabilities:
Deploy uniform blocking rules across your entire network with our exclusive JSON configuration support through Google Admin Console. Ensure consistent content filtering for all users with ease.

Empower your studies or optimize your organization's productivity. Take control of your online environment with Site Blocker today!

*Developed with passion to support distraction-free learning and working environments.*
